channel.title: Deadman Mode - In this world you will die!
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.deadmanps.com/assets/img/logo.png[/img]
[B]Website: [URL=http://"http://www.deadmanps.com/"]CLICK HERE[/URL] [B] Client:[/B] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/3loj1vbpj4tbwh6/public%20client.jar?dl=0"]CLICK HERE[/URL][/B]
[B][SIZE=5]Features: [/SIZE][/B] [code][B]- Safety deposit box where players can store upto 8 items. (Use items on Deposit Box at a bank.) - Kill players for upto 5 bank keys! - Hunt skulled players and take their keys! - Lock two CB skills and three non-cb skills! - Players lose 50% exp on death against players! - 40x Runescape EXP rate - 474 Hotkey system for smoother PKing! - Tonnes of content available, and more to be decided by you! - Discover unique escape routes relying on skills such as agility and thieving, or items like keys to evade danger!
If you are skulled and killed by a NPC you will drop 20 items from your bank for everyone to see and lose 50% exp, if you aren't skulled you will lose 33% of your EXP but no items from your bank. If you are skulled and killed by a player, you will give the killer a key to raid 20 items from your bank and lose 50% exp. If you are unskulled and killed by a player you'll still lose 50% but only 10 items from your bank.
You may attack skulled players without fear of being skulled![/B][/code]
[B][SIZE=5]Media: [/SIZE][/B] [img]http://i.imgur.com/zxst3bS.png[/img] [img]http://i63.tinypic.com/eq8ccn.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/LddsqSM.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/dv09jDW.png[/img] [img]https://i.gyazo.com/b78e2b8b1354800fdfca7d935713117d.png[/img] [SPOILER=Guarded and multi zones][img]http://cdn.runescape.com/assets/img/external/oldschool/2015/deadman/safe-zones-new.jpg[/img][/SPOILER]
[B][SIZE=5]Skill locking:[/SIZE][/B] Currently the skill locking system is under development, you will have to use a command to lock and unlock skills. (::[B]protect[/B] and ::[B]unprotect[/B]) You may have a total of 2 cb skills and 3 non cb skills.[/center]
[code] Attack = 0 Defence = 1 Strength = 2 HP = 3 Range = 4 Prayer = 5 Magic = 6 Cooking = 7 Woodcutting = 8 Fletching = 9 Fishing = 10 Firemaking = 11 Crafting = 12 Smithing = 13 Mining = 14 Herblore = 15 Agility = 16 Thieving = 17 Slayer = 18 Farming = 19 Runecrafting = 20[/code]
Please remember to report any bugs on the forums or a member of staff if available and be patient while the server is developed to a completed state, and enjoy your time on 2006 Deadman Mode.

item.title: Deadman Mode - In this world you will die!
item.dc:creator: @Torque0 Torque0
item.description:
@Torque0 wrote:

[CENTER]

Website: CLICK HERE
Client: CLICK HERE

[SIZE=5]Features: [/SIZE]

[code][B]- Safety deposit box where players can store upto 8 items. (Use items on Deposit Box at a bank.)

  • Kill players for upto 5 bank keys!
  • Hunt skulled players and take their keys!
  • Lock two CB skills and three non-cb skills!
  • Players lose 50% exp on death against players!
  • 40x Runescape EXP rate
  • 474 Hotkey system for smoother PKing!
  • Tonnes of content available, and more to be decided by you!
  • Discover unique escape routes relying on skills such as agility and thieving, or items like keys to evade danger!

If you are skulled and killed by a NPC you will drop 20 items from your bank for everyone to see and lose 50% exp, if you aren’t skulled you will lose 33% of your EXP but no items from your bank.
If you are skulled and killed by a player, you will give the killer a key to raid 20 items from your bank and lose 50% exp. If you are unskulled and killed by a player you’ll still lose 50% but only 10 items from your bank.

You may attack skulled players without fear of being skulled![/B][/code]

[SIZE=5]Media: [/SIZE]

zxst3bS.png764×500

eq8ccn.png774×532

LddsqSM.png766×353

dv09jDW.png767×501

b78e2b8b1354800fdfca7d935713117d.png758×495

[SPOILER=Guarded and multi zones][/SPOILER]

[SIZE=5]Skill locking:[/SIZE]
Currently the skill locking system is under development, you will have to use a command to lock and unlock skills. (::protect and ::unprotect) You may have a total of 2 cb skills and 3 non
cb skills.[/center]

Attack = 0 Defence = 1 Strength = 2 HP = 3 Range = 4 Prayer = 5 Magic = 6 Cooking = 7 Woodcutting = 8 Fletching = 9 Fishing = 10 Firemaking = 11 Crafting = 12 Smithing = 13 Mining = 14 Herblore = 15 Agility = 16 Thieving = 17 Slayer = 18 Farming = 19 Runecrafting = 20

Please remember to report any bugs on the forums or a member of staff if available and be patient while the server is developed to a completed state, and enjoy your time on 2006 Deadman Mode.

Read full topic
